transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Bhashit, haan ji.
Executive: Sir, Aakib ji baat kar rahe hain Diamond store se ek sir.
Customer: Haan ji, Aakib ji baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Aakib ji, Pravesh baat kar raha tha IndiaMART office Noida se.
Customer: Ji, aapka number save hai na?
Executive: Ji, ji. Sir, aapse meri baat hui thi kal to humne aapka pura jo catalog tha dobara se review kara tha sir. Jahan jahan pe hume matlab keywords and all jo jo lage hue sare humne corrections kare.
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Aap bataiye sir matlab aaj jo aapne lead consume kari kaisa raha response sab theek raha?
Customer: Aaj to lead hai hi nahi kahan se consume karu. Maine kal parso jo kal aap se baat hui thi to aapne matlab jo senior the aapke unhone sari leads kharab kar di. Unka ye wali lo aap, ye wali lo. Jo leads thi wo khatam ho chuki hai ab kya lunga main?
Executive: Ek bhi lead consume matlab ek bhi lead nahi mili aapko aaj pure din mein?
Customer: Aaj ek bhi lead nahi mili.
Executive: Aaj morning mein ek lead aayi bhi thi main call kar raha tha aapka number mil nahi raha tha bar bar maine teen char bar kara.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji. Asal mein kya tha jo leads thi na wo sari kal ke kal khatam ho gayi. Ab zero zero zero dikha raha. Weekly wali bhi aur jo bonus ka hota wo bhi.
Executive: Weekly bhi khatam ho gaya?
Customer: Ji, weekly bhi khatam ho gaya. Jo daily ka wo milta hai na bonus wo bhi khatam ho gaya.
Executive: Sir aapko jo weekly wali milti hai wo khatam ho gayi. Daily bonus kal aapko lead milenge ab. Do hai ek lead kal aayegi aapke paas do daily bonus par.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Sir main ye main ye keh raha tha sir dekhiye aapka high value product mein aata hai actively use kariye business hoga. Thoda customer na sir dekhiye jo mahanga product hota hai ek call mein ya do call mein nahi matlab wo convert hota hai sir.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aap thoda follow up karenge 50-60 customer se baat karenge automatically sir positive niklenge wahan se. 100% niklenge sir.
Customer: Par aap.
Executive: Connect rakhiye sir apna Aakib sir. Aap dekhiye sir response aayega aapko.
Customer: Service, service bhai main connect rehta hu. Main IndiaMART pehle bhi nahi chala raha pehle bhi chala chuka hu mere bhai. Kis tarah aapko samjhaun main?
Customer: Wo mujhe pata hai mera business kis tarike ka hai kis tarike ka nahi. Koi bhi customer agar hum koi cheez ₹2 lakh ki batayenge to wo ekdam shock ho jayega. Theek hai? Lekin unko lene se pehle bhi pata hota hai bhaiya kya naam hai ki ye cheez kitne ki hai kitne ki hai na.
Executive: Sir main ye keh raha tha jaise aap bhi samajhte hain ki jaise aaj ke time mein sir dekhiye ek buyer agar koi 50000 60000 ki koi cheez leta hai na wo char panch jagah se quotation leta hai. To aap thoda quotation bhi dekhiye matlab har har supplier ka kya hota hai ki ekdam se rock bottom price nahi dete wo thoda ek price dete hain fir unko pata hai aage Indian buyer hai bargaining karega. Sir price bahut jyada high bhi nahi dena aur aisa bhi nahi dena ki aapke paas bargaining ke liye kuch na bache. To price bhi thoda sa dekhiye sir matlab cheeze wahan pe aapki suljhe ye na ho customer quotation dekhte hi sir aage connect karna na chah raha ho. Kaafi factors hote hain na sir. Samne wala agar aapse ek bar quotation lene ke baad dobara jawab nahi de raha.
Customer: Bhaiya ji main aapki baat samajh raha hu main apna business panch saal se kar raha hu mere iske bare mein mujhe pata hai ki mujhe apna business kis tarike se karna hai customer se kis tarike se baat karni hai kis tarike se nahi. Wo mujhe pata hai mere bhai.
Executive: Aap bataiye sir aapke mind mein kya chal raha hai hum aapki kaise help kare services type mein?
Customer: Help to yahi kar dijiye jo meri profile hai ye aur jo matlab jitne bhi ye leads aati hai na.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: In leads ko bas ek se leke do feet ki sabse jyada ye aa rahi hai. Char feet ki, panch feet ki, che feet ki leads nahi aati. Theek hai? Aur dusri baat ye ki jitni bhi leads hai sabse jyada mere bhai kisi ke number ho maine to aapko kal conference pe leke baat ki thi na kal ki thi parso?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm ji.
Customer: Haan to aap khud dekh rahe the kya bol rahe the keh rahe the ki hum dekh rahe the batayenge abhi to hum inquiry kar rahe the. Inquiry wale bahut jyada.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji. Main panch feet ki ek bhi ek bhi lead ek bhi lead hai hi nahi jo 10 se upar call aayi hui ho.
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: 10 se ek bhi call nahi aayi abhi tak mere paas.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Hmm. Abhi ek panch feet ki dekhiye sir live hai commercial fireproof safe ka aaya hua hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Aur panch feet ki hai ye jaise aap char the na. Sir thoda actively use kariye main whatsapp pe na aapka number add kar raha hu apne sath. Right sir. Main Monday aapse dobara connect karunga hopefully daily basis pe main bhi open karke dekhta hu kitni lead available hai kuch na kuch aapse share karta hu. Positively sir actively use kare.
Customer: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan. Char char ghante pehle panch feet ki aayi hai ye. Haan ji?
Customer: Char ghante pehle Saharanpur ke liye aayi hai.
Executive: [inaudible] hai na.
Customer: Haan double door aur ye ₹50000 tak ki iski wo order order value. Itni ki to mere karkhane se hai mere bhai jo manufacturing hoke tayar hoti hai itni ki mang raha panch feet ka to isme labour charge transport charge aur apne liye kya bachaunga?
Executive: Aapko isko order value nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi chahiye to mujhe aise hi char feet, panch feet, che feet, saat feet ye theek hai isko to main khud convince kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Abhi char panch feet ki teen char lead yahan pe available hai chaliye aapke paas hai nahi points. Dekhiye sir maine catalog pe aaj aapka pura kaam karwaya hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Aap main aapko whatsapp mein whatsapp mein kya naam hai Sarvesh bhai Sarvesh bhai maine bhi kuch photo add kiye the abhi aapne dekhe ho.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan main aur photo achche achche aapko send kar dunga aap unko add kar dena.
Executive: Aap dijiye dijiye main karwa dunga main abhi aapka ek bar apna number boliyega sir number boliyega ek bar dobara se apna main aapko whatsapp pe hi likh ke bhej raha hu.
Customer: Ji. 9917
Executive: 99 ke baad kya hai sir?
Customer: 17
Executive: 17?
Customer: Ji. 52
Executive: 56?
Customer: 5252.
Executive: 252. Sir number dobara repeat kijiyega.
Customer: Mere bhai 52 ek hi bar hai bas kabhi aap double do bar kar do.
Executive: Ek second rukiye ek second main nikal hi leta hu yahan se number ek second rukiye.
Customer: Haan aap nikal hi lo.
Executive: Ek second hold kariyega sir.
Customer: Okay. No problem.
Executive: 5280.
Customer: 93 9313.
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Haan aa gaya main dekhiye main whatsapp pe aapko hi likh ke bhej raha hu.
Executive: Thank you sir.
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Customer: Anit Bhatia?
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir main whatsapp kar raha hu ek second. 99175 29 313 right sir?
Customer: Haan ji. Haan ji.
Executive: Right. Dekhiye whatsapp pe aapko hi likh ke aa gaya hoga.
Customer: Jab tak nahi aayega jab tak aap udhar se call cut nahi karoge main aapko cut nahi karunga.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Jab tak call cut nahi hogi jab tak message nahi aayega bhai.
Executive: Aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya aa gaya kya? Haan aa gaya aa gaya. Ab sir dekhiye aap mujhse direct connect kariye main bhi daily basis pe open karta hu daily jo lead aap consume kar rahe hain kal to hamara off rehta hai Saturday Sunday. Right sir?
Customer: Haan achcha ji.
Executive: To Monday main aapse connect karunga aur agle panch din daily hum jo aap pichle din jo aapne lead consume kari hai uska review karenge. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Okay okay okay okay.
Executive: Baki baki ye concern main aapka close kar raha hu ek feedback mail aayega feedback jarur dijiyega Pravesh likh ke kuch comment. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Ji theek hai bhai theek hai.
Executive: Aur main aapki photos add karwa deta hu jo jo aapne di hai mujhe abhi add karwa raha hu main. Theek. Okay sir. Thank you.
Customer: Okay. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states leads are of low value.

- Customer says leads are not converting.

- Customer says weekly and daily bonus leads exhausted.



Resolution:

- Executive explained high value product conversion process.

- Executive assured to check lead availability daily.

- Executive added customer's number on WhatsApp.

- Executive will connect on Monday for review.

- Executive will add the photos to the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect on Monday for review.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, catalog, whatsapp, follow up, order value
